remarks: The extended real numbers restricted to ` RR* \ { -oo } ` form a commutative monoid.  They are not a group because ` 1 + +oo = 2 + +oo ` even though ` 1 =/= 2 ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Nov-2014.)
statement:
xrs1mnd.1 $e |- R = ( RR*s |`s ( RR* \ { -oo } ) ) $.
